property.name: sql
property.value: WITH latest_status_feeds AS ( -- get all latest status feed for daily basis SELECT bfmd.bill_file_id FROM bill_file_meta_data bfmd WHERE bfmd.status = 'PUBLISHED' AND bfmd.bill_file_name LIKE 'b2c%.ubf.%' and bfmd.status_update_date::date = NOW()::date ORDER BY bfmd.status_update_date ), pmt_disabled_accounts AS ( -- get all the disabled account from the `latest_status_feeds` SELECT DISTINCT ON (b.account) b.account, CASE WHEN (b.flex6 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex6 NOT IN ('enabled')) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS payment_disabled, CASE WHEN (b.flex6 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex6 IN ('disableDQ')) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS payment_disabled_dq, CASE WHEN (b.flex7 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex7 NOT IN ('enabled')) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ach_disabled, CASE WHEN (b.flex8 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex8 NOT IN ('enabled')) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS portal_access_disabled, CASE WHEN (b.flex15 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex15 IN ('disabled')) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS recurring_payment_disabled, CASE WHEN (b.flex15 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex15 IN ('disabledUntilCurrent')) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS recurring_payment_disabled_until_current, b.bill_date AS bill_date, b.account AS internal_account, b.flex18 AS current_amount_due, b.self_reg3 AS monthly_payment_amount, bfmd.payment_group AS payment_group, bfmd.status_update_date AS status_date FROM bill_summary bs JOIN bill b ON b.bill_id = bs.bill_id LEFT JOIN bill_file_meta_data bfmd ON bfmd.bill_file_id = b.bill_file_id WHERE bs.bill_file_id in ( SELECT * FROM latest_status_feeds ) AND ( b.flex6 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex6 NOT IN ('enabled') -- payment disable reason. OR b.flex7 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex7 NOT IN ('enabled') -- ach disable reason. OR b.flex8 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex8 NOT IN ('enabled') -- portal access disbaled reason OR b.flex15 IS NOT NULL AND b.flex8 NOT IN ('eligible', 'enrolled') -- recurring payment status ) ) SELECT -- get all user_id related to the account numbers of `pmt_disabled_accounts` pcu.userid::varchar, pda.payment_disabled, pda.payment_disabled_dq, pda.ach_disabled, pda.portal_access_disabled, pda.recurring_payment_disabled, pda.recurring_payment_disabled_until_current, pda.bill_date, pda.internal_account, pda.current_amount_due, pda.monthly_payment_amount, pda.payment_group, pda.status_date FROM prof_company_user pcu JOIN prof_company_account pca ON pca.company_id = pcu.companyid JOIN tm_account ta ON ta.id = pca.account_id JOIN pmt_disabled_accounts pda ON ta.account_number = pda.account

property.name: deleteScheduled
property.value: DELETE FROM pmt_schedule WHERE online_trans_id IN (:ids)

property.name: deleteRecurring
property.value: DELETE FROM pmt_automatic WHERE automatic_id IN (:ids)

property.name: getScheduledInfoByUserId
property.value: select ps.online_trans_id, ta.account_number_display as account_number, ps.pay_date as payment_date, pw.source_num as wallet_name, ps.pay_amt as amount, pw.source_type from pmt_schedule ps join pmt_wallet pw on ps.source_id = pw.source_id join prof_company_user pcu on ps.user_id = pcu.userid::varchar join prof_company_account pca on pcu.companyid = pca.company_id join tm_account ta on ta.id = pca.account_id where ps.user_id = :userId

property.name: getRecurringInfoByUserId
property.value: select pa.automatic_id, ta.account_number_display as account_number, pw.source_num as wallet_name, pw.source_type from pmt_automatic pa join pmt_wallet pw on pa.source_id = pw.source_id join prof_company_user pcu on pa.user_id = pcu.userid::varchar join prof_company_account pca on pcu.companyid = pca.company_id join tm_account ta on ta.id = pca.account_id where pa.user_id = :userId
